articles.title: S&P 500 and Nasdaq rise as Amazon gets traders excited about AI trade again: Live updates - CNBC

articles.title: Tim Cook says Apple is open to M&A on the AI front - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook noted in the company's Q4 2025 earnings call that Apple was preparing to announce more AI partnerships like the one it has with OpenAI to integrate ChatGPT into Siri and Apple Intelligence.
